page.title: 20Religion Survey
page.content:
{SURVEY CARRIED OUT WITH 25 CHILDREN
7 children attended Church of Ireland 15 " " Presbyterian 2 " " Brethren 1 child had no connections
{4 children had parents with no church {connections. 17 children attended church organisations (e.g. Brownies, Guides) {2 children are members of a Good News {Club} 9 children have been attending a weekly meeting run by the Free Presbyterian Church in the Library {1 child belongs to the Campaigners {group in the Methodist Church, {although she is not a member of that {Church 10 children attend school S.U. group {19 children attend Sunday School
